summary: This Ruby SDK dependency pull contains 3 high-severity vulnerabilities in transitive Go dependencies (golang.org/x/net and golang.org/x/text), affecting HTTP/2 stream handling and language parsing. The issue was automatically closed by Mend as the vulnerable library was removed from inventory.
userImpact: Applications using this SDK version are exposed to potential denial-of-service attacks through crafted HTTP/2 streams or malicious Accept-Language headers.
rootCause: Transitive dependencies golang.org/x/net and golang.org/x/text contain unpatched vulnerabilities in HTTP/2 HPACK decoder and language parsing
proposedFix: Upgrade golang.org/x/net to v0.7.0 or later and golang.org/x/text to v0.3.8 or later
resolutionDetails: Automatically closed by Mend as the vulnerable library was removed from the dependency inventory
keyQuote: This issue was automatically closed by Mend because the vulnerable library in the specific branch(es) was either marked as ignored or it is no longer part of the Mend inventory.
